alert.note: Alert for Upper Jefferson (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 11:14AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON PARISH THROUGH 1145 AM CDT... At 1113 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing funnel clouds over River Ridge, or near Metairie, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...If a funnel cloud briefly touches down, minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Metairie, River Ridge, Waggaman, and New Orleans Armstrong Airport. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 222 and 225. FUNNEL CLOUDS...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
